ABOUT US
Established in 1978, Indian Bayou Golf Club is a premier 18-hole golf destination located in the heart of Destin, Florida. Designed by Golf Course Architect Earl Stone,  Indian Bayou offers five different tee boxes & picture perfect greens assuring golfers of all skill levels have a stern yet fair test of golf.
​
Golf Course Architect: Earl Stone (1978)
Club President: Mike Kelly
Director of Golf: Jim Carpenter
Head Golf Professional: Austin Helms
​
Services Offered
Golf Club Rentals
Srixon Golf Clubs are available for rent. Each player is required to have their own set. ID will be held while clubs are out. Renter is responsible for damages and lost clubs.
Clubs are Srixon ZXI5 Line
Cost is $60 for 18 Holes
$40 for 9 Holes
Golf Lessons
Need a tune up? Contact Austin and the Bayou Golf Academy to get signed up for lessons today!
​
(850) 837 6191 ext 6

​
​
M
Membership Opportunities
​
​
​
Annual
Single ..................................................$3750
Couple.................................................$4500
Family.................................................$4900
Corporate
2 Partners or Officials of Firm..............$7000
Each Additional...................................$3000
​
​
Semi-Annual (Oct. 1st - Mar. 31st)
Single....................................................$1875
Couple..................................................$2600
Quarterly (Jan 1st - Mar. 31st)
Single...................................................$1050
Couple..................................................$1350
​
​
​
Members receive a 20% discount on purchases in the Pro Shop. This discount applies to merchandise that is not currently discounted.
​
Practice Facilities including the driving range and private putting/chipping area are available to members at no charge.
​
Members pay cart fees. $25 for 18 holes or $17 for 9 holes.
​
Member pay walking rates. $15 for 18 or $10 for 9 holes.
​
Members receive $35 off per hour on golf lessons from Austin at The Bayou Golf Academy.
​
Members have the ability to join the LGA or MGA and play in their events
​
Bag storage & locker rooms available.
​
​
​
For more information on membership, please email one of the following staff members
​
Jim Carpenter :
Jim@indianbayougolf.com
Carla Marler:
Carla@indianbayougolf.com
Austin Helms:
Austin@indianbayougolf.com
Membership Application
